statements: SELECT * FROM patient_medication_adherence;
SELECT patient_id, medication_id, dispensed_timestamp, adherence_status FROM patient_medication_adherence;
SELECT patient_id, medication_id FROM patient_medication_adherence WHERE adherence_status = true;
SELECT * FROM patient_medication_adherence WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT medication_id, dispensed_timestamp FROM patient_medication_adherence ORDER BY dispensed_timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, adherence_status FROM patient_medication_adherence;
SELECT * FROM patient_medication_adherence WHERE adherence_status = TRUE;
SELECT patient_id, medication_id, dispensed_timestamp FROM patient_medication_adherence ORDER BY dispensed_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_medication_adherence WHERE medication_id = 123 AND adherence_status = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM patient_medication_adherence;
SELECT * FROM patient_medication;
SELECT medication_name, medication_dosage FROM patient_medication WHERE medication_dosage > 50;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, last_medication_timestamp FROM patient_medication WHERE last_medication_timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM pill_dispenser ORDER BY last_refill_timestamp DESC;
SELECT dispenser_id, patient_id, dispenser_name FROM pill_dispenser WHERE patient_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM patient_medication WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT medication_name, medication_dosage FROM patient_medication ORDER BY medication_dosage DESC;
SELECT p.patient_id, p.medication_name, d.dispenser_name FROM patient_medication p INNER JOIN pill_dispenser d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_medication WHERE medication_dosage > 100 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM last_medication_timestamp) = 2022;
SELECT p.patient_id, COUNT(d.dispenser_id) AS num_dispensers FROM patient_medication p LEFT JOIN pill_dispenser d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id GROUP BY p.patient_id HAVING num_dispensers >= 2;
SELECT * FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients
SELECT medication_id, medication_name, dosage FROM medication
SELECT * FROM pill_dispensers
SELECT dispenser_id, patient_id, last_dispensed, quantity_left FROM pill_dispensers
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medication WHERE dosage > 10;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name FROM patients JOIN pill_dispensers ON patients.patient_id = pill_dispensers.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, last_dispensed, quantity_left FROM patients JOIN pill_dispensers ON patients.patient_id = pill_dispensers.patient_id WHERE quantity_left < 10;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT medication_name, medication_dosage FROM medications ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, timestamp FROM patients JOIN medication_records ON patients.patient_id = medication_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT medication_name, medication_dosage FROM medications WHERE medication_dosage LIKE '%mg%' ORDER BY medication_name DESC;

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dispenser_name FROM patients p JOIN medication_records mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id JOIN medications m ON m.medication_id = mr.medication_id JOIN pill_dispensers pd ON pd.dispenser_id = mr.dispenser_id;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female' UNION SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age < 30;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_record FROM medication_records;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE medication_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM pill_dispensers WHERE location = 'Pharmacy';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, is_adherent FROM medication_logs WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%' ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medication_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, timestamp FROM patients JOIN medication_logs ON patients.patient_id = medication_logs.patient_id ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
